DOC.brief_summary: It report deep extubation reduce cardiopulmonary complication endotracheal tube extubation emergence general anesthesia . The investigator hypothesize use desflurane target control infusion remifentanil effective use desflurane alone deep extubation . The purpose study evaluate effect remifentanil prevent respiratory complication ( etc . cough ) emergence general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Deep Extubation During Emergence Using Desflurane Desflurane With Remifentanil Patients Undergoing General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Age 2060 patient undergo elective surgery take hour Under general anesthesia use LMA ASA I , II Patients CNS depressants Chronic opioid use Corticosteroid Pregnant patient Full stomach Morbidly obese ( BMI > 35kg/m2 ) Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Coronary artery disease Liver disease Renal disease Seizure disorder Dropout criterion : Need reintubation due breath hold high ETCO2 self ventilation ( ETCO2 > 50 ) Surgeon patient request
